name: Halloween SEX Party [18+]
description:
Halloween SEX Party [18+] is a casual game with original puzzle mechanics based on runners.
Alongside it, this game features a fascinating storyline in the unique setting of Halloween Horror.
To experience the whole journey with our Halloween girls girls you have to win a variety of levels by finding the escape of levels.

Instead of controlling the character outright, you have to interact with the environment to move through the levels.
Unlock the doors, avoid traps, and destroy your enemies before they do you damage.

Game Features:
  • Experience the Halloween Horror theme and reveal the truth alongside our main Heroines!
  • All our characters move with Live2D animations! You will be able to interact with them all.
  • Dive deep into our Halloween girls' personalities & go through the story together with them.

All characters are over 18 years old
